languages.text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Increases the rate of fire of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, perplexed is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

languages.text: 装备者的武器{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高1点。杀死敌人时，目标周围2格内所有敌人都会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: 装备者的武器{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高1点。杀死敌人时，目标周围2格内所有敌人都会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态。

languages.text: Увеличивают {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} оружия на 1. При каждом убийстве врага персонаж накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на всех других противников в радиусе 2 клеток.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Увеличивают скорострельность оружия на 1. При каждом убийстве врага персонаж накладывает замешательство на всех других противников в радиусе 2 клеток.
Увеличивают скорострельность оружия на 1. При каждом убийстве врага персонаж накладывает замешательство на всех других противников в радиусе 2 клеток.

languages.text: 使用者の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}を+1増加させる。敵がキルされるたびに、半径2セル以内にいるその他の敵すべてに{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を付与する。
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}を1上げる。敵がキルされるたびに、半径2セル以内にいるその他の敵すべてに{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を付与する。

languages.text: Aumenta +1 la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} del arma del portador. Cada vez que muere un enemigo, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} a los enemigos a un radio de 2 casillas.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Aumenta +1 la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} del arma del portador. Cada vez que muere un enemigo, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} a los enemigos a un radio de 2 casillas.

languages.text: Erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} der Waffe des Trägers um +1. Wurde ein Feind getötet, werden alle anderen Feinde in einem Radius von 2 Feldern mit {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} der Waffe des Trägers um +1. Jedes mal wenn ein Feind getötet wurde, wird {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} bei allen anderen Feinden in einem 2-Zellen-Radius verursacht.

languages.text: Accroît de +1 la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de l'arme de l'utilisateur. Chaque fois qu'un ennemi est éliminé, l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} est infligé à tous les autres ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Accroît de +1 la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de l'arme de l'utilisateur. Chaque fois qu'un ennemi est éliminé, l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} est infligé à tous les autres ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases.

Accroît de +1 la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de l'arme de l'utilisateur. Chaque fois qu'un ennemi est éliminé, l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} est infligé à tous les autres ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin silahının {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızını{/g} +1 artırır. Her düşman öldürüldüğünde 2 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki diğer tüm düşmanlarda {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} etkisi oluşur.
languages.original_text: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon by +1. Each time an enemy is killed, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} is inflicted on all other enemies in a 2-cell radius.
